sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { share } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.router.navigateByUrl("/presentation#aboutme"); } activeFragment = this.route.fragment.pipe(share()); }
  • About Me

  • Contact me
